segments.text: To start with , may I know why you are interested in working for our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , as far as I know , your company has had an impressive growth record . Second , I want to get into the foreign trade business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now you are with Quandong Company . What is your chief responsibility there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm in charge of marketing activities in South-East Asia , for example , organizing trade conferences and arranging exhibitions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any questions about the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Are there chances for employees to be transferred to overseas branches of the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . This is an international company , and ther're good chances for you to work overseas .
segments.speaker: S1
